Course Description: This course is designed for exposure to circuits and systems design techniques for radio communications leading towards the recent research in the domain of advanced radio technology.

Mandatory: Foundations of Electromagnetic Fields and Waves

Resource Material.Textbook: RF Circuit Design Theory and Applications, 2nd edition – R. Ludwig and G. Bogdanov, Pearson Economy
Reference Book: Microwave Engineering, 3rd Edition – D. M. Pozar, Wiley
Secrets of RF Circuit Design – Joseph Carr, McGraw Hill
RF Circuit Design – R. Bowick, Newnes
